entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
